title: Sections
description: Sections describe large areas/regions of the page. Sections are `children` of an implied `site` global class. This prevents overly generic class names like `header` that SHOULD be used by `collections`.

sections.title: Header
description: The header of the site. Styles MUST only affect the container and positioning of collections, items, and elements within.

sections.title: Footer
description: The footer of the site. Styles MUST only affect the container and positioning of collections, items, and elements within.

sections.title: Main
description: The main content of the site. Styles MUST only affect the container and positioning of collections, items, and elements within.

sections.title: Sidebar
description: The sidebar(s) of the site. Styles MUST only affect the container and positioning of collections, items, and elements within.

sections.title: Nav
description: The navigation(s) of the site. Styles should only affect the container and positioning of collections, items, and elements within. Note: `.nav` is a `collection` class.
